title: Oil Rises as Stock Futures Edge Down
sub_head: The yield curve remained inverted, with the yield on two-year Treasurys higher than the 10-year yield
body:
U.S. stock futures edged down while oil prices gained Tuesday as investors waited to see if Western nations would institute fresh sanctions against Russia.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average shed 0.2%, a day after indexes were pulled higher by rallying technology stocks. Tech-heavy Nasdaq-100 futures slipped 0.2%.
